Co-op Covenants.Name: Warrior of Sunlight
Co-op Covenants.Location: Join the Warriors of Sunlight covenant in the Undead Parish.
Co-op Covenants.Notes: Increase in covenant rank through successful cooperative multiplayer sessions using the White Sign Soapstone.

Co-op Covenants.Name: Princess Guard
Co-op Covenants.Location: Obtain the Covenant of the Princess by joining Gwynevere's covenant in Anor Londo.
Co-op Covenants.Notes: Princess Guard is a unique covenant that focuses on protecting Princess Gwynevere. Covenant members can use unique miracles.

Co-op Covenants.Name: Way of White
Co-op Covenants.Notes: Way of White is a starting covenant and offers benefits such as easier matchmaking for cooperative play.

PvP Covenants.Name: Darkwraith
PvP Covenants.Location: Join Darkwraiths covenant by speaking with Darkstalker Kaathe in the Abyss.
PvP Covenants.Notes: Darkwraiths are focused on invading other players' worlds and stealing humanity.

PvP Covenants.Name: Forest Hunter
PvP Covenants.Location: Join the Forest Hunter covenant by speaking with Alvina in the Darkroot Garden.
PvP Covenants.Notes: Forest Hunters are focused on invading trespassers in the Darkroot Garden area.

Rewards: After a loading screen Alvina talks about Shiva and the distrust she has in him.

PvP Covenants.Name: Path of the Dragon
PvP Covenants.Location: Join the Path of the Dragon covenant by offering scales to Everlasting Dragon in Ash Lake.
PvP Covenants.Notes: Path of the Dragon covenant allows players to gain Dragon Head and Torso Stones, enabling unique dragon abilities.

Rewards: Dragon Eye and Dragon Head Stone acquired
Dragon Head Stone flame damage increases
Dragon Torso Stone roar increases in range and the attack buff becomes 27.5%
Dragon Head Stone flame damage increases
Dragon Torso Stone roar increases in range and the attack buff becomes 30%
Dragon Head Stone flame damage increases
Dragon Torso Stone roar increases in range and the attack buff becomes 35%

PvP Covenants.Name: Blade of the Dark Moon
PvP Covenants.Location: Join the Blade of the Dark Moon covenant by speaking with Gwyndolin in Anor Londo.
PvP Covenants.Notes: Blade of the Dark Moon members are tasked with avenging those who have been wronged and protecting Gwyndolin.

Rewards: Darkmoon Blade Miracle power increases to 2.0 * Magic Adjust
Darkmoon Blade Miracle power increases a second time to 2.1 * Magic Adjust

PvP Covenants.Name: Gravelord Servant
PvP Covenants.Location: Join the Gravelord Servant covenant by speaking with Gravelord Nito in the Catacombs.
PvP Covenants.Notes: Gravelord Servants infect other players' worlds with stronger enemies to engage in unique player vs. environment (PvE) gameplay.

Rewards: 10% damage bonus to both Gravelord sword miracles
20% damage bonus to both Gravelord sword miracles
30% damage bonus to both Gravelord sword miracles

Other Covenants.Name: Chaos Servant
Other Covenants.Location: Join the Chaos Servant covenant by speaking with Quelaag's Sister in Quelaag's Domain.
Other Covenants.Notes: Chaos Servant is focused on offering Humanity to advance the covenant and unlock shortcuts in the game.

Rewards.Reward: Upon joining, receive Great Chaos Fireball
Receive Chaos Storm and can open the shortcut to Lost Izalith.
